thread.section_title: Days Inn Hotel New York City-Broadway - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nasty
thread.title_full: Nasty - Review of Days Inn Hotel New York City-Broadway, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kina B
title: Nasty
text:
So me and my family checked into hotel on 2/18/17, got off elevator and smelled weed, room had mold, nasty carpet, toilet was running,the furniture was old and chipped,Checked out same day!!! Horrible condition. Ruined my vacation all together I do not recommend this hotel for anyone that is traveling from out of town and trying to find a decent place to stay, and if you have a good job you may not want to go there you may be tested positive for weed
Poor excuse for a hotel
